title: Vaccines Bioprocess Development & Commercialization Workshop - BioMAN Consortium; MIT-CBI
description: This three day workshop will explore the critical issues at the various stages of vaccine development, including research, operational and regulatory challenges of the vaccine market.
sitename: BioMAN Vaccines Bioprocess Development & Commercialization Workshop
